name: Ghosty (Asimuth)
description:
Ghosty is a small project from 2020, which i never finished. At the time of making, i was playing Half Life, so i borrowed a few things from that game, so it's not completely original.

The controls are what somewhat what you'd expect in most games.

The first room is a test room, you can just go off-screen, a play trough the few levels there are,

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse - Fire

Space - Menus
